places.name: Egyptian Museum
places.description: Home to ancient treasures like the treasures of Tutankhamun and the Mummy of Cleopatra

places.name: Khan el-Khalili
places.description: A bustling traditional bazaar filled with spices, perfumes, textiles, and souvenirs

places.name: Al-Azhar Mosque
places.description: One of the oldest and most prestigious universities in Islamic history, with a stunning mosque

places.name: Saqqara Pyramids
places.description: Ancient pyramids dating back to the Fourth Dynasty, offering a glimpse of early Egyptian civilization
places.amenities: Guided tours, Camel rides, Horseback riding

places.name: Giza Pyramids
places.description: The iconic pyramids of Giza, along with the Sphinx and the surrounding tombs
places.amenities: Guided tours, Horseback riding, Camel rides

places.name: Islamic Cairo
places.description: A district filled with Islamic landmarks like mosques, madrasas, and historical sites

places.name: Manial Palace
places.description: A stunning palace known for its beautiful gardens and royal history

places.name: Al-Saladin Citadel
places.description: A medieval fortress offering panoramic views of Cairo and its rich history
places.amenities: Guided tours, Military museum, Observation deck

places.name: Coptic Cairo
places.description: A historic district with ancient Christian churches and relics

places.name: Museum of Islamic Art
places.description: A renowned museum showcasing Islamic art and artifacts from various eras
